description: Join us for an alcohol-free beer tasting and brewery tour! Our shutter will be open all afternoon for you to pop in and join us for a beer. Our brewer James will lead a brewery-tour session at 2pm giving the low-down on the magic behind alcohol-free brewing, followed by a guided tasting with a selection of four great Nirvana beers.

events.name: Drop in: Open day
events.notes: Our shutter will be open all afternoon for you to pop in and join us for a beer.

events.name: Tour
events.notes: Our brewer James will lead a brewery-tour  giving the low-down on the magic behind alcohol-free brewing.

factsheet.heading: Tools of the Trade: Open Day and Tour
paragraphs: Join us for an alcohol-free beer tasting and brewery tour! Nirvana Brewery will be opening its doors to offer the chance to sample our delicious and varied range of non-alcoholic beers. From craft lagers and hoppy pale ales, to wheat beers and dark and rich stouts, all of Nirvanaâ€™s beers are delightfully alcohol-free.

Our shutter will be open all afternoon for you to pop in and join us for a beer. Our brewer James will lead a brewery-tour session at 2pm giving the low-down on the magic behind alcohol-free brewing, followed by a guided tasting with a selection of four great Nirvana beers.

location.address: Unit T6, Leyton Industrial Village, Argall Avenue, E10 7QP
travel_info: Additional travel info: Nearest stations: Lea Bridge (National Rail via Tottenham Hale and Stratford), St James Street (Overground)

name: Nirvana Brewery
